Version 1.7.29 - Token Details API, Company Expiration, UI Fixes

New Features

  • get_token_details API: Retrieve comprehensive token information including user roles, restrictions, creation info, service, company data, and more
  • get_companies_access_status API: Monitor company access status and expiration dates, with token counts and days remaining
  • Company access expiration: Set expiration dates for company access in the Admin UI with automatic disable on expiry

UI Improvements

  • Added expiry date picker to Company Access page
  • Added "Expired" badge for companies with expired access
  • Fixed duplicate page titles across 6 admin pages

Technical Details

  • New scheduled task: expire_company_access runs every 6 hours
  • Database: Added expirydate field to company access table
  • Translations: English, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazilian)
